settings.html:
Barco® Coronis Fusion MDCC-6230 is a high-quality general radiology diagnostic PACS display optimized for grayscale and color imaging. It efficiently integrates images from multiple modalities, such as CR, CT, MR, cath, and echocardiogram, making it an ideal choice for radiologists seeking top-notch image quality, increased productivity, and enhanced workflow flexibility.

Featuring a 30-inch LCD screen, the MDCC-6230 offers the flexibility to operate as a single 6MP (3,280 x 2,048 pixels) display or split into two seamless 3MP displays (1536 x 2048 pixels each). This user-friendly design allows radiologists to organize and interpret images side by side without a center bezel or visual distractions.

A great feature of MDCC-6230 is its power-efficient LED backlight. LED backlights consume less power, are high in brightness, and produce significantly less heat, thus greatly increasing the monitor's lifespan. In addition, MDCC-6230 is equipped with a built-in I-Guard photometer front sensor for automatic DICOM calibration and quality assurance (QA) tests, simplifying routine checks and ensuring consistently high-quality imaging.

Equip your workspace with the Barco® Coronis Fusion MDCC-6230 and experience an enhanced workflow that aligns with the evolving needs of radiologists looking for a modern, high-quality diagnostic display for teleradiology.

settings.title: High-Quality Dictation Microphone for Healthcare Professionals
settings.content: Discover the Nuance PowerMic III, a high-quality dictation microphone designed with the needs of healthcare professionals in mind. This reliable and user-friendly device is perfect for radiologists and other medical practitioners who require efficient, accurate, and hands-free documentation.

settings.title: Easy Navigation With Dictation
settings.content: The PowerMic III offers a seamless USB plug-and-play installation, eliminating the need for a sound card and simplifying the setup process. Its unidirectional noise-cancellation feature ensures accurate performance, even in bustling clinical environments. The microphone is also equipped with an easy-to-clean antimicrobial surface, promoting safety in healthcare settings.

settings.title: Control At Your Fingertips
settings.content: Nuance PowerMic III brings clinician dictation by making it quick and easy to control the microphone, navigate and select on-screen fields, and insert, review, and edit generated text. Full-function mouse capabilities give clinicians handy access to basic operations and limit keyboard use, speeding documentation creation. Programmable microphone buttons can perform commonly-used actions and compound clinician efficiency and convenience.

settings.title: Noise Cancelling
settings.content:
The noise-cancelling functionality of the Nuance PowerMic III is a game-changer for healthcare professionals who rely on dictation to document patient information. By effectively blocking out extraneous sounds such as conversations, medical equipment beeps, or background chatter, the device ensures that the spoken words are captured accurately, without any interference.

With the Nuance PowerMic III's exceptional noise-cancelling technology, healthcare professionals can confidently dictate patient notes, reports, and other documentation in any setting. By significantly reducing background noise and eliminating distractions, the device enables clinicians to focus on delivering high-quality care and ensures that critical information is accurately captured, enhancing both efficiency and patient safety.

settings.title: Total Control on Your Microphone
settings.content: One of the standout features of the PowerMic III is its full-function mouse capabilities. This design allows clinicians to control the microphone, navigate and select on-screen fields, and insert, review, and edit text quickly and easily. The device's programmable buttons can be customized to perform commonly used actions, enhancing efficiency and convenience.

settings.title: Tailored Cable Lengths for the Microphone
settings.content: The 3-foot cable is commonly employed for laptop users characterized by limited space availability, catering to scenarios where portability and restricted distances between components are paramount considerations. Conversely, the 9-foot cable finds extensive application in desktop workstations, particularly in situations where the workstation is distanced significantly from the display monitors. This cable length ensures seamless connectivity and facilitates efficient data transmission over extended distances, ensuring optimal performance within professional healthcare settings, particularly in radiology applications where precise and timely image rendering is essential for accurate diagnoses

settings.title: Comfortable and Light
settings.content: The PowerMic III's ergonomic design ensures that it sits comfortably in the hand, accommodating various hand sizes and gripping styles. The device is shaped to promote a natural hand position, reducing fatigue during prolonged use. This ergonomic approach takes into account the unique needs of healthcare professionals who rely on the device for extended periods, ensuring that they can maintain focus and precision during critical moments without experiencing discomfort.

settings.title: Compatibility with Windows and Nuance Dictation Software
settings.content: The Nuance PowerMic III is a professional-grade, handheld dictation microphone that is designed to improve the productivity and accuracy of speech recognition users. It is compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, and Windows 11 operating systems, as well as all Nuance Dictation Software, including Dragon Medical One, Dragon Professional Anywhere, and SpeechKit.

settings.title: Features
settings.content:
Ergonomic, thumb control operation

Simplified design makes it easier for dictating, navigating, reviewing, and editing speech recognition generated documentation.

Plug and play installation

USB connectivity ensures compatibility with a wide range of computers.

Accurate dictation

Unidirectional microphone with noise‑cancellation ensures higher accuracy in even the noisiest environments.

Intuitive design for ease of use

The Nuance PowerMic III boasts an intuitive design aimed at enhancing user convenience. It integrates a pointing device, mouse-like functionality, and tab features for swift navigation. Additionally, its ergonomically angled microphone ensures both optimal recording quality and user comfort.

settings.title: Buttons Map
settings.content:
1. Flush, angled microphone element offers optimal user comfort and recording level/signal.

2. Transcribe button transfers text from the dictation box to the cursor location or toggles display of the dictation box.

3. Tab-forward/tab-backward buttons speed navigation through on-screen fields.

4. Dictate button turns the microphone on and off.

5.“Track-point” controls the cursor to navigate screens and select functions.
